mergearticles-extension-desc: Allows merging comparing and merging articles
mergearticles-merge-new-help: Page "$1" does not exist yet and this merge will create it. Please check and, if necessary, modify the content before merging.
mergearticles-merge-existing-help: Page "$1" exists already! Please compare the changes below.
mergearticles-show-final-text-label: All merge conflicts were resolved, final text can now be viewed and, if needed, corrected before merge. Note: After this point, merge conflict cannot be modified anymore!
mergearticles-discard-draft-help: This action will delete this draft page. Are you sure you want to proceed?
mergearticles-no-diff-message: There is no difference in text between draft and target page!
mergearticles-no-content-message: There is no content on this page. Content can be added in the below
mergearticles-no-diff-file-message: Source file is identical to the target file
apihelp-ma-merge-page-new-summary: Merges a draft version into a new page
apihelp-ma-merge-page-existing-summary: Merges a draft version into an existing page
apihelp-ma-set-related-titles-summary: Relates a page to a draft version of the page
apihelp-ma-discard-draft-summary: Discard existing draft version of a page
mergearticles-apihelp-param-skipfile: Bool. Set if files should be skipped
mergearticles-apihelp-param-relatedto: Integer. ID of the page, the given page should be set as related to
